p: The lateral expansion rate of Spartina maritima × densiflora (21 ± 2 cm yr −1) was not significantly different from that of its seed parent S. maritima (44 ± 6 cm yr −1), and its rate was higher than that of S. densiflora × maritima (4 ± 2 cm yr −1) which presented a similar lateral expansion rate to its seed parent S. densiflora (5 ± 0.3 cm yr −1) (Kruskal-Wallis, H = 47.421, P < 0.001; Dunn’s test, P < 0.05) ( Supplementary Table S1 and Figure 1).
